name: Shades of Justice
description:
Blast through waves of enemies, losing control options with each wave you clear. On wave 1, you may be using WASD to move. By wave 6, you could be using WADownRight. See how far you can get with an increasingly convoluted control scheme!

Made as part of the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020. 

Theme: Out of Control

Running: Unzip the Shades of Justice download and navigate to WindowsNoEditor. From there, you will see the executable file, GMTK2020.exe. Double-click to start the game.
